name: Fruit Friends!
description:
Fruit Friends was made for Hedge Jam 4. Unfortunately, the full game wasn't completed, but you can still have some fun in a limited version.

Background:

You are an apple, the only fruit who hasn't been gifted the ability to fly. Your other "Fruit Friends" must assist you in completing levels. Their are no true levels in this unfinished version.

Instructions:

Click on the fruits in the top bar to select the fruit you want to place. Click to place the fruit. Oranges act like a regular platform. bananas are bouncy, and can be rotated when you hover over it and press "r". Grapes allow you to glide for a short time, and Cherries can teleport you vertically. Because their are no levels, just try it all out and figure out as many ways as possible to get from the starting hole to the ending hole.
